thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com | 2 of 49
thread.title: Anne/James Larsen
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Anne/James Larsen

author: Anne/James Larsen
title: Anne/James Larsen
text:
We received our lobsters when promised and in excellent shape. They were delicious.
We did have a concern of which I wrote to the company. I wrote yesterday and have not received a response. Over the past 20 years we have vacationed in Maine and have enjoyed many lobsters over the years. In our two lobsters we noted something never before seen by us. Either in or beside the green gland/roe was an inky black substance which we were able to wash off. I requested an explanation of this and have not, so far, had any response from the company.
